name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search RARBG Torrents by IMDB ID

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search RARBG Torrents by searching for the IMDB ID for the wanted TV show/movie

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension you can search RarBG website by name TMDB name and it will search by IMDB ID
